text: Kajsa Rinaldo Persson (born 11 November 1997) is a Swedish tennis player. Rinaldo Persson has a career high WTA singles ranking of 524 achieved on 21 December 2015 and a career high WTA doubles ranking of 648, achieved on 14 December 2015. Rinaldo Persson has won 1 ITF singles title and 1 ITF doubles title. Rinaldo Persson has represented Sweden in the Fed Cup, where she has a W/L record of 1–1. ==ITF Finals (3–4)== === Singles (1–1) === {| |-valign=top | {|class=wikitable style="font-size:85%" !Legend
